attributes.action: not claim back child tax credit overpayments paid over the first 3 years where errors occurred at the Tax Credit Office
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the child tax credit has led many families into owing the government money through mistakes being made at the Tax Credit Office. Despite many people being able to prove the errors were made ot the office they still have to pay the money back. many families owe thousands of pounds and it can take many years to re-pay the money

rejection.details: This petition overlaps several already in existence - http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/taxmistakes/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
